dc_description_s: This point shapefile provides the location, current and previous owners, power type and other infomation for power plants in the United States. This layer is part of a collection of GIS data for renewable and electric energy in the U.S. This layer is from the 2014 Summer Quarter update (Update 1016).This layer can be used to locate power plants within the United States.
